name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 19, several media outlets and bloggers published articles titled "U.S. Embassy in China Fake News Rebutted by Global Times", claiming that the U.S. Embassy deliberately changed the letter l on the webpage to the number 1, creating the illusion that the news was inaccessible, but was refuted by Global Times.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A mother in Zibo, Shandong, posted on Weibo that her daughter, who was in the third grade of Boshan No. 6 Middle School, had a hearing disability, but was suspected of being targeted by her class teacher and eventually jumped from the class teacher's office and died.
After the child jumped from the building, the local education bureau was reluctant to deal with the matter and shirked responsibility many times. It refused to supervise the matter on the grounds that "the province knew about this matter, and supervision now would affect the school's credibility", and kept delaying the establishment of an investigation team.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 18, "Li Peixia was criticized for being full of five evils" became a hot search
Such a high-level verdict aroused doubts and confusion among the public, and many netizens believed that Li Peixia's crime was not so serious.
Some netizens also said, "The township secretary in a small county with an underdeveloped economy is full of five evils, so aren't people in other places even more evil?"
Currently, this topic has been banned and is not displayed.
